website_summaries.verdict: For all the real peanut butter lovers, Trader Joe's makes a pretty good substitute.
pros: This 4-ingredient sunflower butter has the same smooth consistency as peanut butter, but healthier
It has a similar amount of saturated fat
cons: Sugar is added – may not be best for dieters

customer_reviews.title: The flavor isn’t the problem
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product - it tastes great and avoids the allergens that we need to avoid. That said, after doing some more leg work, I believe that this is overpriced — which is why it has so few stars from me. Regarding flavor alone, I’d give it 4 stars .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the very best in the Non-peanut butter alternatives!  I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This tastes great, digests well, spreads well, is an overall really excellent product! I need to eat certain products due to digestive problems, food allergies, etc. I have finally found a wonderful winner in this Trader Joe's Sunflower Seed Butter. It's better than peanut butter (that's a given since peanut butter can irritate even those without a peanut allergy) but I was shocked at how much more easily I digested this Trader Joe's Sunflower Seed Butter than almond butter. For anyone out there with gastroparesis, colon transit issues, reflux, celiac, etc. I'd say give it a try. I've searched forever plus it spreads very easily so a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pierotti

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative!
customer_reviews.text: Having Hypothyroidism/Hashimotos has pushed me into a new realm of eating food. My lifestyle was always rather healthy but since my diagnosis Ive noticed allergies that I hadn't had before. that being said, I tried Trader Joes Sunflower Seed Butter on a recommendation (due to not being able to have peanut butter any longer) and I love it! the texture and consistency is identical and the taste is fantastic! A great alternative to standard peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: megan h

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like this sunflower butter better than others I have tried. It has not separated since I received it, stirred it up and kept it in the frig. still tasting great.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tasting, love this! My kids with nut allergies love it to. And they are so picky!! I found it at Walmart for much better price though. Under $5.00.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sunflower seed butter
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty creamy sunflower seed butter. Strong sunflower seed flavor. Good texture not runny. Awesome alternative to peanut butter. Very good!
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: If you are trying to cut back on foods high in Oxalates, then this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: Those of you dealing with Oxalate kidney stones and have been told by your doctor to cut back on foods high in Oxalates, then you're in luck! You can now give up eating your peanut butter and switch to Sunflower butter! So happy to find this.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Joy

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved peanut butter, then I developed an allergy to peanuts. I always felt that I was being deprived of one of nature's comforts. This sunflower seed butter is the BEST, and I think i've tried them all
customer_reviews.author: jacman

customer_reviews.title: Buybit from the store if possible.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Just buy it from the brick and mortar store. Way cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: ClanReynolds

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good alternative for peanut butter and especially if anybody has any allergies. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful mom

customer_reviews.title: Would re-purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Didn’t think I would like it better than peanut butter, but I do.
customer_reviews.author: Sooneal

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good!
customer_reviews.text: This is tasty and a very good sub for peanut butter
customer_reviews.author: LearningasIgo

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: This butter taste great, very much like peanut butter but better for you.
customer_reviews.author: WHD6

customer_reviews.title: Yummy in my tummy ...
customer_reviews.text: Yummy and double yum! I love sunflower seed butter and Trader Joe's is very tasty. Try it - you'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Violetwrites Leftow

customer_reviews.title: Very Tasty
customer_reviews.text: This is very good. It's cheaper at TJ's, but if you don't want to go into a store then this is great.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: yum....
customer_reviews.text: Yummy....pricey but very tasty. Will buy again...but will probably drive to store.
customer_reviews.author: Islesfan27

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Yum! I've missed nut butters since I've developed an allergy. This is delicious and satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: SuziQ

customer_reviews.title: Gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sister. She loves this so I order them for her about every three months.
customer_reviews.author: Dee S.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced!!
customer_reviews.text: Good product but completely overpriced. I thought I would get a 2-pak.
customer_reviews.author: Martie Woodford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and creamy....wish I had discovered this along time ago...
customer_reviews.author: KATHERINE J KOPP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunflower seed butter!!! I can't get enough of it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: This tastes really good.
customer_reviews.text: This Trader Joe's Sunflower seed butter tastes really good in oatmeal. It has sugar added. It has about the same saturated fat as peanut butter and almond butter. It is easy to spoon out. It needs to be refrigerated after being opened.
customer_reviews.author: EleganzShopper

customer_reviews.title: great alternative
customer_reviews.text: Tastes really good. My daught takes it to school as there is another kid with a peanu t allergy. She lobes ot and she is very picky if it wasn't so expensive I myself would replace peanut with it yum!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, ok... with the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite peanut butter. I buy multiple jars at a time because I go through it so quickly. The only reason I bought this online was that my local Trader Joe's had been out of stock for the past two weeks in a row and I was desperate! Would rather not pay shipping but desperate times call for desperate measures.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Markus

customer_reviews.title: Peanut Allergy?
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to Peanut Butter for anyone with nut allergies. My son is allergic to peanuts and this one is the closest to smooth peanut butter than any of the others. He liked the taste and texture of this sunflower seed butter better than all others. We have tried them all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Mom

customer_reviews.title: new addiction!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this product before and I liked it so I knew it was going to be ok and I was not disappointed.I already have an addiction of peanut butter its like my favorite food but this one really takes the cake!
customer_reviews.author: Devon MacPhee

customer_reviews.title: Sunflower seed butter
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the sunflower seed butter as soon as it was available. The dealer made sure I received the butter after they were out of it the first time I ordered it. I have used it on my morning bagel and enjoyed the flavor. I will use it in various ways instead of peanutbutter to vary my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Rowrich

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of sunflower butter until I read about it on a paleo website. Much tastier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Sunflower seed butter
customer_reviews.text: I really like the taste of this. It is a little thinner than peanut butter, but not much. I will absolutely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Gluck

customer_reviews.title: It's not bad, but it's not great either
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad, but it's not great either. Takes a bit of getting used to. The consistency is much thinner than your average peanut butter, so it is easy to spread on bread and toasts. If only the after taste is not that strong.
customer_reviews.author: Mazzii

customer_reviews.title: TRADER JOE'S SUNFLOWER SEED BUTTER
customer_reviews.text: MY DAUGHTER TOLD ME ABOUT THIS BUTTER. I WAS HESITANT TO BUY IT. BOY, WAS I WRONG. IT'S SIMPLY SO TASTY. I CAN'T BELIEVE HOW FAST THIS ARRIVED. AMAZON, YOU ARE TRULY THE BEST!!!!! EILEEN
customer_reviews.author: eileen

customer_reviews.title: sugar
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this has sugar added. Other than that it's great. When they packed it, they couldn't have used more plastic wrap, and made it more difficult to get the plastic wrap off - so I won't be ordering it again, for those 2 reasons. It tastes great though, if you don't mind the added sugar.
customer_reviews.author: pen💮

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think I like it better than peanut butter,it is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: EXBRN

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, Creamy
customer_reviews.text: It is tasty and creamy like peanut butter. It has been a great substitute for peanut better. We don't have any nut allergies in our house, but my daughter is not allowed to bring peanut butter to school, so I use this spread when I send a sandwich with her or when I made sandwiches for the whole class for snack. My daughter eats both peanut butter and sunflower butter and likes them both.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Product good, seller not.
customer_reviews.text: This product was advertised as two for one (get a second jar free) but I only received one. No reason to pay for shipping if it's not a discounted price. In general stick with products sold by Amazon. When I complained about the false advertising here, they did agree to credit 1/2 of the purchase price but I still paid for the shipping. The product itself is great, a perfect substitute since kids can't bring peanut butter to school/camp anymore.
customer_reviews.author: benjo1975

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two and only received one.  I was charged for two.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two and only received one. It was O.K. but I was disappointed. I was ordering one for another person. I opened mine but never received the other so could not give one away.
customer_reviews.author: William Carl

customer_reviews.title: Will be trying it real soon.
customer_reviews.text: Smells like peanut butter, but not sure about the taste. Want to use in bakery in place of peanut products.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: disappointed in price not product
customer_reviews.text: I was in a hurry when I ordered this item and was quite surprised by the $16 price tag.....I guess I expected like many of the other brands to at least receive 2 jars?! My mistake...won't happen again. Other than that product was good...delivery was good.
customer_reviews.author: hymel5

product_meta.title: Trader Joe's Sunflower Seed Butter 16oz
product_meta.description: Trader Joe's Sunflower Seed Butter is a tasty spread for bread and crackers!
feature_bullets: Delicious taste ready to be spread! 100% ORGANIC
Butter made from the highest grade of sunflower seeds available
